name: National Merit Scholarship Program - STEM Award
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school seniors demonstrating exceptional STEM abilities. Based on PSAT/NMSQT scores and academic excellence in science and mathematics.

name: NSBE Jr. High School STEM Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for African American high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Recognizes academic achievement and leadership in engineering and technology.

name: SWE High School Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for female high school students planning to study engineering or computer science. Recognizes women pursuing STEM careers.

name: Dell Scholars Program - STEM Track
description: $20,000 scholarship for low-income high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Includes laptop and ongoing support throughout college.

name: Coca-Cola Scholars Program - STEM Award
description: $20,000 scholarship for high school seniors with outstanding leadership and STEM achievement. Highly competitive national scholarship.

name: Gates Scholarship - STEM Emphasis
description: Full tuition scholarship for minority high school seniors pursuing STEM fields. Covers full cost of attendance not covered by financial aid.
stem_fields: General STEM, Computer Science, Engineering, Science

name: Ron Brown Scholar Program - STEM
description: $40,000 scholarship for African American high school seniors pursuing STEM. Renewable award for exceptional academic achievement.

name: Intel Science Talent Search Scholarship
description: $7,500-$250,000 for high school seniors with exceptional STEM research projects. Recognizes independent research in science and mathematics.

name: STEM Education Coalition Scholarship
description: $2,500 for high school students planning STEM careers. Recognizing commitment to science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

name: Best Buy @ 15 Scholarship - Technology Track
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school students pursuing technology and computer science. For students with GPA 2.5+ interested in tech careers.

name: Lockheed Martin STEM Scholarship
description: $10,000 renewable scholarship for high school seniors pursuing engineering or computer science. Four-year renewable award.

name: Google Generation Scholarship
description: $10,000 scholarship for underrepresented minority high school students pursuing computer science. For African American, Hispanic, or Native American students.

name: Microsoft Tuition Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing computer science or related STEM fields. Partial tuition support for first year.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Science

name: Buick Achievers Scholarship - STEM
description: $25,000 renewable scholarship for high school seniors pursuing engineering or technology. Emphasis on first-generation college students.

name: AXA Achievement Scholarship - STEM
description: $10,000 scholarship for high school seniors with outstanding STEM achievement and community service. National competition.

name: UNCF-Merck Science Initiative
description: $6,900 scholarship for African American high school seniors pursuing life sciences or chemistry. Includes summer research opportunities.

name: Davidson Fellows Scholarship - STEM
description: $10,000-$50,000 for high school students with extraordinary STEM projects. Recognizing significant contributions to mathematics and science.

name: SMART Scholarship for STEM
description: $25,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing STEM degrees in specific fields. Includes summer internship opportunities.

name: Elks National Foundation Most Valuable Student - STEM
description: $4,000-$12,500 scholarship for high school seniors with outstanding STEM academic achievement. Based on scholarship, leadership, and financial need.

name: NSHSS STEM Scholar Award
description: $1,000 scholarship for National Society of High School Scholars members pursuing STEM. For students with 3.5+ GPA in science courses.

name: Boeing Company Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing aerospace engineering or related STEM fields. Renewable for up to four years.

name: GE-Reagan Foundation Scholarship
description: $10,000 renewable scholarship for high school seniors pursuing STEM or business. Emphasis on leadership and entrepreneurial spirit.

name: AFCEA STEM Major Scholarships
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing STEM degrees in communications, electronics, or computer science fields.

name: Regeneron Science Talent Search
description: $2,000-$250,000 for high school seniors with exceptional STEM research. Top 40 finalists invited to Washington DC for judging.

name: NACA Regional Council Student Leader Scholarship - STEM
description: $500-$1,000 for high school students pursuing STEM with demonstrated leadership. For student council members and leaders.

name: Horatio Alger STEM Scholarship
description: $25,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing STEM who have overcome adversity. For students facing financial hardship.

name: SMART Girls Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for female high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Supporting women in science, mathematics, and technology.

name: National Space Club Keynote Scholarship
description: $10,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing aerospace or space-related STEM fields. For students passionate about space exploration.

name: NAMEPA Scholarship Foundation STEM Award
description: $5,000 scholarship for minority high school students pursuing STEM degrees. National Action Council for Minorities in Engineering award.

name: AWS Girls Tech Program Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for female high school students pursuing computer science or cloud computing. Supporting women in technology careers.

name: Science Olympiad Scholarship
description: $1,500 scholarship for high school Science Olympiad competitors pursuing STEM. For students who participated in state or national competitions.

name: First Robotics Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship for FIRST Robotics Competition participants pursuing engineering or computer science. For team members demonstrating leadership.

name: Environmental Protection Agency STEM Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for high school students pursuing environmental science or engineering. For students committed to environmental protection.

name: Biomimicry Institute Youth Design Challenge Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school students creating nature-inspired solutions. For students using biology to solve engineering challenges.

name: NAACP ACT-SO STEM Award
description: $3,000 scholarship for African American high school students excelling in STEM competitions. Afro-Academic, Cultural, Technological and Scientific Olympics.

name: Thurgood Marshall College Fund STEM Scholarship
description: $6,200 scholarship for students attending HBCUs pursuing STEM fields. Supporting students at historically black colleges and universities.
stem_fields: General STEM, Engineering, Computer Science, Science

name: Siemens Foundation Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school students pursuing engineering or computer science. Supporting future innovators in STEM fields.

name: NCWIT Aspirations in Computing Award
description: $500-$10,000 scholarship for female high school students pursuing computing. National Center for Women & Information Technology award.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering

name: ASM Materials Education Foundation Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing materials science or engineering. Supporting future materials scientists.

name: AMS Weather Band Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing atmospheric science or meteorology. American Meteorological Society award.

name: Stokes Educational Scholarship Program (NSA)
description: $30,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing computer science or cybersecurity. National Security Agency sponsored program.

name: Barry Goldwater Scholarship
description: $7,500 scholarship for high school juniors/seniors pursuing research careers in STEM. Covers sophomore through senior years.

name: Generation Google Scholarship - North America
description: $10,000 scholarship for underrepresented minorities and women pursuing computer science. Includes Google mentorship opportunities.
